Heijari will be responsible for leading Vungles continued expansion in the rapidly - growing European market .
Vungle ads are now in more than 5,000 different apps and more than 100 million people worldwide see a Vungle ad every month .
To address that rapid growth , Vungle plans to triple ts headcount by years end .
